name: query

timestamp_from.description: To get entries since the timestamp for unified historical query.

timestamp_to.description: To get entries before the timestamp for unified historical query.

filters.description: A list of filters. Type:{"type": string, "value": string, "op": string}. Op: filter operator [exact|contains|greaterThanEqualTo|lessThanEqualTo]. Default is exact.

query_id.description: Provide a query ID to continue getting data for that unified request. Only available for unified query types.

cache_query.description: Cache query result for 5 mins and return query ID. Only available for unified query types. Default is false.

key_only.description: Return primary key fields only. Default is false.

filter_logic.description: The logic between filters [and|or]). Default is and.

total_only.description: Whether the query should return just the total number of identities present.

GET.summary:
Query user info.
Access Group: authgrp

total.name: total
total.title: Total
total.description: Total number of user info entries that match the filter.

count.name: count
count.title: Count
count.description: Number of user info entries returned.

response_description: Retrieve user info that matches the given filter.
